comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Dr. William C. Woodward seems largely remembered by the Marijuana Law Reform group, for testimony he made representing the American Medical Association.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Bisbee daily review., July 09, 1915, Page 5 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84024827/1915-07-09/ed-... uses this photo with an announcement that he will be the mayor's choice for head of the New York City health department. The Ogden standard., July 07, 1915, 4 P.M. CITY EDITION, Image 2 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85058396/1915-07-07/ed-... has the same article.
